about_the_game:
Aritana and the Harpy's Feather" is an exciting platform game that stands out for its innovative stance-switching mechanics. Your choices shape your speed, attacks, and special abilities, providing a fast and intuitive challenge. Assuming the role of Aritana, you embark on a dangerous mission, navigating dense forests, scaling Harpy's Mountain, and confronting the fearsome Mapinguari.



This inaugural title in the franchise pays sincere homage to classic 2D platformers, offering formidable challenges that reward player skills. Prepare for an unforgettable journey and uncover the hidden secrets of the Forest in this thrilling adventure.

Furthermore, Aritana's universe expands with complimentary comics revealing the captivating origins of the powerful shaman's staff. Explore the awakening of dual energies and the mysteries surrounding the staff's powers by visiting the franchise's official website!



  • Explore Multiple Environments Inspired by Brazilian Indigenous Culture;
  • Upgrade the Shaman's Staff with Special Moves and Abilities;
  • Create Combos to Overcome Challenging Obstacles;
  • Face Epic Encounters with the Fearsome Mapinguari;
  • Play with Both Keyboard and Xbox 360 Controller;

highlighted.name: The Song Will Show the Way
